column4: Does anyone know where you can download atheros wifi drivers? They seem non-existant
Mdwifi is not working for me, I wanted to try ndiswrapper
check in the restricted driver dialog in the admin menu, I beleive atheros are covered
how do I check the restricted driver dialog exactly?
it says the Atheros driver is in use, but I do not see the wifi under the network settings
I will take a look, thanks. You are helping everyone!
you can use ndiswrapper to run the window drivers on linux
boot windows , look in hte hardware manager, find our card see what driver it uses, copy the file , import in ubuntu
no install cd with your card ?
it's not ubuntu's fault that you can't find a driver, give me your card model and I'll see what I can do
did you look at that link I just gave you ? with the driver you needed on it ?
that's the xp driiver not the vista one
that was my best try , sorry it wasn'T enough,
